org.fluidity.composition.container

Interface ContainerServices


  • public interface ContainerServices
    Common services for container implementations. This is an internal interface to be used by dependency injection container implementations.

    Usage

     final class MyContainerImpl extends EmptyComponentContainer {

   MyContainerImpl(final ContainerServices services) {
     …
   }
 }
    See Also:
    ContainerProvider

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ComponentDiscovery componentDiscovery()
      Returns the service to use to find classes implementing some component or service provider interface.
      Log createLog(Log log, Class<?> source)
      Create an Log instance, once per source class.
      DependencyInjector dependencyInjector()
      Returns the component that can perform dependency injection to constructors, fields, and methods.
      ContextDefinition emptyContext()
      Creates an empty context definition.
      DependencyGraph.Traversal graphTraversal()
      Returns a new graph traversal.
      DependencyGraph.Traversal graphTraversal(ComponentContainer.Observer observer)
      Returns a new graph traversal initialized with the given resolution observer.
      ComponentCache newCache(boolean stateless)
      Creates and returns a new component cache instance.

    • Method Detail

      • emptyContext

        ContextDefinition emptyContext()
        Creates an empty context definition.
        Returns:
        an empty context definition; never null.

      • componentDiscovery

        ComponentDiscovery componentDiscovery()
        Returns the service to use to find classes implementing some component or service provider interface.
        Returns:
        the component discovery service; never null.

      • dependencyInjector

        DependencyInjector dependencyInjector()
        Returns the component that can perform dependency injection to constructors, fields, and methods.
        Returns:
        the dependency injector; never null.

      • graphTraversal

        DependencyGraph.Traversal graphTraversal()
        Returns a new graph traversal.
        Returns:
        a new graph traversal; never null.

      • graphTraversal

        DependencyGraph.Traversal graphTraversal(ComponentContainer.Observer observer)
        Returns a new graph traversal initialized with the given resolution observer.
        Parameters:
        observer - the object to notify when a component interface gets resolved to a class.
        Returns:
        a new graph traversal; never null.

      • newCache

        ComponentCache newCache(boolean stateless)
        Creates and returns a new component cache instance.
        Parameters:
        stateless - specifies whether the component can actually be cached or not. Value true means the component can be cached.
        Returns:
        a new component cache instance; never null.

      • createLog

        Log createLog(Log log,
              Class<?> source)
        Create an Log instance, once per source class.
        Parameters:
        log - the Log instance the source class currently has.
        source - the source class.
        Returns:
        the instance the source class currently has, unless it is null, in which case a new instance is returned.
